tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar çok insanla tanışırsam köpeğimi o kadar daha çok seviyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Rus Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Balığa denizden başkası azaptır.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın insanlardan kaçışıdır hayvan sevgisi.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Arının evini yıkan balın tatlılığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Genceli Nizami

tr_quotes.quote: Kuşlar doğa adlı annenin güzel çalgıcılarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Gavin Douglas

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanlar arkandan konuşmazlar ve yarı yolda bırakmayı hiç bilmezler
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi arkadaşlarımız hayvanlardır. Ne soru sorarlar, ne de kusur kabahat bulurlar
tr_quotes.author: George Elliot

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın gerçek yüzünü görebilenlerin birer hayvansever olması kaçınılmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanlara karşı acımasız olan, iyi bir insan olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir hayvan kendi türüne işkence yapmaz.
tr_quotes.author: H. Veldet Velidedeoğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Ben size Allah’dan korkunuz, hayvanları incitmeyiniz, rahatlarını bozmayınız demiyor muyum?
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Kedi sevgilisinde muhakkak tırmık izi bırakır.
tr_quotes.author: Henry de Montherland

tr_quotes.quote: Ağzında bal olan arının kuyruğunda iğnesi de vardır.
tr_quotes.author: John Lyly

tr_quotes.quote: Ruhunda hayvan sevgisi olmayan insandan uzaklaş
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kedi evden dışarı çıkınca fareler oyuna başlarlar.
tr_quotes.author: John Florian

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbinde merhamet olmayana cennet yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Her kim aç bir hayvanı beslerse aynı zamanda ruhunu besler.
tr_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

tr_quotes.quote: Canlı hayvana işkence eziyet edene lanet olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Kurtların içinde ceylan masumiyetiyle ömür sürülmez.
tr_quotes.author: Hüseyin Rahmi Gürpınar

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün hayvanlar arasında yalnızca kedidir yaşamı seyreden. Var olmanın döner dolabını mesafeli bir konumdan izler. Kedide sempatik olma kaygısı yoktur. Yalnızca yaşar, uzak, dingin ve bilge.
tr_quotes.author: Andrew Lang

tr_quotes.quote: Hangi kabadayı fare kedinin boynuna çıngırak takabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Mihayloviç Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: İri bir at gücü dolayısıyla değil huyu dolayısıyla övülür.
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ruhunun bir parçası hayvan sevgisini tadana kadar uyanmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anatole France

tr_quotes.quote: Kuş insafsız ellerin yıkacağından korksa da yine yuvasını kurar.
tr_quotes.author: Kalman Mikszath

tr_quotes.quote: Biz hem kurtların doymasını hem de koyunların sağ kalmasını istiyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi arkadaşlarımız hayvanlardır ne soru sorarlar ne de kusur kabahat bulurlar.
tr_quotes.author: George Elliot

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin büyüklüğü ve ahlaki gelişimi, hayvanlara olan davranış biçimi ile değerlendirilir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanlar insanlar için ne iyi arkadaştır ne sual sorarlar ne de insanı tenkit ederler.
tr_quotes.author: George Elliot

tr_quotes.quote: Bazılarına hayvan demek onları yüceltir. Hayvan olmak için masum olmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evcil hayvanların içlerinde birçok insandan daha fazla sevgi vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kedinin dostluğu, tonlarca ilaçtna çok daha şifalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Enzo Jannac

tr_quotes.quote: Ben size Allah’tan korkunuz, hayvanları incitmeyiniz, rahatlarını bozmayınız demiyor muyum?
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ruhunun bir parçası hayvan sevgisini tadana kadar uyanmaz
tr_quotes.author: Anatole France

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin büyüklüğü ve ahlaki gelişimi, hayvanlara olan davranış biçimi ile değerlendirilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi arkadaşlarımız hayvanlardır, ne soru sorarlar, ne de kusur, kabahat bulurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Allah (cc) buyurur ki: Hayvanlar benim sessiz kullarımdır. Şimdi susuyorlar ama hesap günü konuşacaklardır
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanlara karşı acımasızlık; ne gerçek eğitim, ne de gerçek bilginlik ile bağdaşır.
tr_quotes.author: A.Von Humboldt

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar, hayvanlardan farklı olarak, aklın gücüne sahiptir ve onu kullanmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvana binecekseniz tatlılıkla bininiz. Yük vuracaksanız takatinin üstünde yüklemeyiniz. Kesecekseniz en az ıstırap verecek şekilde kesiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Köpek bu dünyada kendinden daha çok sizi seven tek kişidir
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hangi kabadayı fare, kedinin boynuna çıngırak takabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi arkadaşlarımız hayvanlardır, ne soru sorarlar, ne de kusur, kabahat bulurlar.
tr_quotes.author: George Eliot

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatı boyunca iyi olmaya çalıştı. Çoğu kere başarısız oldu. Ne de olsa bir insandı. Bir köpek değildi.
tr_quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ruhunun bir parçası hayvan sevgisini tadana kadar uyanmaz
tr_quotes.author: Anatole France

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın insanlardan kaçışıdır, hayvan sevgisi.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanları her seven kişi ille hayvanları da sevmez;ama insanları seven her kişi,hayvanları,doğayı kesinlikle sever.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvan masalları, insanların kusurlarını düzeltmeye yarar.
tr_quotes.author: G.Verga

tr_quotes.quote: Hayvanları koruma, insan oluşa doğru eğilimin aşamalarındandır.
tr_quotes.author: A.Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: Animals are such agreeable friends - they ask no questions; they pass no criticisms
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: There's a saying. If you want someone to love you forever, buy a dog, feed it and keep it around
en_quotes.author: Dick Dale

en_quotes.quote: What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight - it's the size of the fight in the dog
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Until one has loved an animal a part of one's soul remains unawakened
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: If a dog will not come to you after having looked you in the face, you should go home and examine your conscience
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Cats have it all - admiration, an endless sleep, and company only when they want it
en_quotes.author: Rod McKuen

en_quotes.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: Pets have more love and compassion in them than most humans
en_quotes.author: Robert Wagner

en_quotes.quote: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a function
en_quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

en_quotes.quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: I love cats because I enjoy my home; and little by little, they become its visible soul
en_quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

en_quotes.quote: I poured spot remover on my dog. Now he's gone
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: I believe cats to be spirits come to earth. A cat, I am sure, could walk on a cloud without coming through
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: It is much easier to show compassion to animals. They are never wicked
en_quotes.author: Haile Selassie

en_quotes.quote: It's difficult to understand why people don't realize that pets are gifts to mankind
en_quotes.author: Linda Blair

en_quotes.quote: The dog is the god of frolic
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Like all pure creatures, cats are practical
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Cats know how to obtain food without labor, shelter without confinement, and love without penalties
en_quotes.author: W. L. George

en_quotes.quote: The clever cat eats cheese and breathes down rat holes with baited breath
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: I've always been mad about cats
en_quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

en_quotes.quote: Animals are sentient, intelligent, perceptive, funny and entertaining. We owe them a duty of care as we do to children
en_quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

en_quotes.quote: I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: I had been told that the training procedure with cats was difficult. It's not. Mine had me trained in two days
en_quotes.author: Bill Dana

en_quotes.quote: Some dog I got too. We call him Egypt. Because in every room he leaves a pyramid
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: Way down deep, we're all motivated by the same urges. Cats have the courage to live by them
en_quotes.author: Jim Davis

en_quotes.quote: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things
en_quotes.author: George Carlin

en_quotes.quote: Even cats grow lonely and anxious
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Dogs got personality. Personality goes a long way
en_quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

en_quotes.quote: A kitten is in the animal world what a rosebud is in the garden
en_quotes.author: Robert Southey

en_quotes.quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this
en_quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

en_quotes.quote: One of the most obvious ways dogs can improve our physical and mental health is via daily walks
en_quotes.author: Andrew Weil

en_quotes.quote: We have three cats. It's like having children, but there is no tuition involved
en_quotes.author: Ron Reagan

en_quotes.quote: I don't have pet peeves; I have whole kennels of irritation
en_quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: Why would you want to do anything else but rescue a pet?
en_quotes.author: Paul Shaffer

en_quotes.quote: No one appreciates the very special genius of your conversation as the dog does
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole
en_quotes.author: Roger Caras

en_quotes.quote: What a dog I got, his favorite bone is in my arm
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: There is something very independent about French balloons - you feel you couldn't make a pet of one
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

en_quotes.quote: Just watching my cats can make me happy
en_quotes.author: Paula Cole

en_quotes.quote: I think there's something great and generic about goldfish. They're everybody's first pet
en_quotes.author: Paul Rudd

en_quotes.quote: To his dog, every man is Napoleon; hence the constant popularity of dogs
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Dogs laugh, but they laugh with their tails
en_quotes.author: Max Eastman

en_quotes.quote: Disrespect is my biggest pet peeve
en_quotes.author: Bill Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: I got a pet monkey called Charlie Chan
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: A happy arrangement: many people prefer cats to other people, and many cats prefer people to other cats
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: I used to love dogs until I discovered cats
en_quotes.author: Nafisa Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Scratch a dog and you'll find a permanent job
en_quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

en_quotes.quote: No one can feel as helpless as the owner of a sick goldfish
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: People who keep dogs are cowards who haven't got the guts to bite people themselves
en_quotes.author: August Strindberg

en_quotes.quote: My little dog - a heartbeat at my feet
en_quotes.author: Edith Wharton

en_quotes.quote: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort
en_quotes.author: James Herriot

en_quotes.quote: I looked up my family tree and found three dogs using it
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: No matter how much cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: A real Christian is a person who can give his pet parrot to the town gossip
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: My roommate got a pet elephant. Then it got lost. It's in the apartment somewhere
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: I worked in a pet store and people would ask how big I would get
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face
en_quotes.author: Bernard Williams

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with a kitten is that eventually it becomes a cat
en_quotes.author: Ogden Nash

en_quotes.quote: Kittens are wide-eyed, soft and sweet. With needles in their jaws and feet
en_quotes.author: Pam Brown

en_quotes.quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail
en_quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Dogs are my favorite people
en_quotes.author: Richard Dean Anderson

en_quotes.quote: The smallest feline is a masterpiece
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The cat is a dilettante in fur
en_quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

en_quotes.quote: I've got a new invention. It's a revolving bowl for tired goldfish
en_quotes.author: Lefty Gomez

en_quotes.quote: Cats seem to go on the principle that it never does any harm to ask for what you want
en_quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

en_quotes.quote: I can't imagine God not allowing my dog into heaven
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful
en_quotes.author: Ann Landers

en_quotes.quote: Cats are inquisitive, but hate to admit it
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: A dog teaches a boy fidelity, perseverance, and to turn around three times before lying down
en_quotes.author: Robert Benchley

en_quotes.quote: A lover tries to stand in well with the pet dog of the house
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: Cats have a scam going - you buy the food, they eat the food, they go away; that's the deal
en_quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

en_quotes.quote: Pet me, touch me, love me, that's what I get when I perform. That's when I'm really getting what I want
en_quotes.author: Connie Stevens

en_quotes.quote: Packing is my pet hate
en_quotes.author: Seal

en_quotes.quote: I could never date a guy with a pet snake
en_quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: The trees in Siberia are miles apart, that is why the dogs are so fast
en_quotes.author: Bob Hope

en_quotes.quote: If you are a dog and your owner suggests that you wear a sweater suggest that he wear a tail
en_quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

en_quotes.quote: I wonder if other dogs think poodles are members of a weird religious cult
en_quotes.author: Rita Rudner

en_quotes.quote: A dog is a vehicle, you know; a dog is a window to Mother Nature, and that's the closest species we have
en_quotes.author: Cesar Millan

en_quotes.quote: I have a pet goat
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

en_quotes.quote: When you're fighting for social justice, one of my biggest pet peeves is speaking out of ignorance
en_quotes.author: Eva Longoria

en_quotes.quote: I always pet a dog with my left hand because if he bit me I'd still have my right hand to paint with
en_quotes.author: Juan Gris

en_quotes.quote: The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: I like animals because they are not consciously cruel and don't betray each other
en_quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

en_quotes.quote: Cat: a pygmy lion who loves mice, hates dogs, and patronizes human beings
en_quotes.author: Oliver Herford

en_quotes.quote: A hungry dog hunts best. A hungrier dog hunts even better
en_quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Every time I decide I want a child I get another pet. I have 3 dogs, 13 birds and 3 horses, what does that tell you?
en_quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

en_quotes.quote: Being successful is about professionalism, and chewing gum is unprofessional. Its also a huge pet peeve of mine
en_quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

en_quotes.quote: We are deeply sorry for the loss of anything - from your luggage to, of course, a loved pet
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: It was so cold today that I saw a dog chasing a cat, and the dog was walking
en_quotes.author: Mickey Rivers

en_quotes.quote: I really love animals. My cat is my little soul mate. He's not just a cat, he's my friend
en_quotes.author: Tracey Emin

en_quotes.quote: It's true, you can never eat a pet you name. And anyway, it would be like a ventriloquist eating his dummy
en_quotes.author: Alexander Theroux

en_quotes.quote: I was ridiculed in public school for being smart. A teacher's pet
en_quotes.author: Julia Glass

en_quotes.quote: Maybe humans are just the pet alligators that God flushed down the toilet
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: My biggest pet peeve, I guess, is other comedians criticizing Larry the Cable Guy
en_quotes.author: Ron White

en_quotes.quote: Never wear anything that panics the cat
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: There's just me and my wife and a dog and we feed him Healthy Choice also
en_quotes.author: Mike Ditka

en_quotes.quote: Growing up in Kansas City, I was always neat, the teacher's pet, know-it-all type
en_quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

en_quotes.quote: My parents used to take me to the pet department and tell me it was a zoo
en_quotes.author: Billy Connolly

en_quotes.quote: There's kind of a toll you have to pay with a cat; if you don't pet her for 10 minutes she'll bother you for six hours
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: There are all sorts of cute puppy dogs, but it doesn't stop people from going out and buying Dobermans
en_quotes.author: Angus Young

en_quotes.quote: It's just so nice when your pet isn't all needy. I need a lot of space, so dogs suffocate me
en_quotes.author: Kerli

en_quotes.quote: My pet hate, with customers, is those that think it's all about wallets
en_quotes.author: Marco Pierre White

en_quotes.quote: I love pigs. I think they're very cute. I really want a pet pig, but those micro pigs, they don't stay micro
en_quotes.author: Nicole Byer

en_quotes.quote: I used to have this little mouse. I buy birds from the pet store and I let them go
en_quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

en_quotes.quote: Cats don't like change without their consent
en_quotes.author: Roger Caras

en_quotes.quote: One of my pet peeves is when people think that pop guys go country when they can't make it in pop anymore
en_quotes.author: Darius Rucker

en_quotes.quote: To me, a cat is an easy pet, they don't need any spoiling or looking after
en_quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

en_quotes.quote: When a guy tells me I'm cute, it's not something desirable. Cute is more like what you want your pet to be
en_quotes.author: Natalie Portman

en_quotes.quote: I really want a pet, and I really love animals
en_quotes.author: Aurora

en_quotes.quote: Where I go, rap goes. Rap is like my dog; it's like my little pet. And where I go, I lead my little pet with me
en_quotes.author: KRS-One

en_quotes.quote: If cats were double the size they are now, they'd probably be illegal
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: I live alone, with cats, books, pictures, fresh vegetables to cook, the garden, the hens to feed
en_quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

en_quotes.quote: I love cats
en_quotes.author: Dick Van Patten

en_quotes.quote: We wanted a pet food based on sound scientific principles and truth, not marketing hype
en_quotes.author: Dick Van Patten

en_quotes.quote: On 'Death In Paradise,' I had a CGI pet lizard and had to react to nothing, which was hideously embarrassing
en_quotes.author: Ben Miller

en_quotes.quote: Many who have spent a lifetime in it can tell us less of love than the child that lost a dog yesterday
en_quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

en_quotes.quote: The world spends $40 billion a year on pet food
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Kristof

en_quotes.quote: I kind of imagine myself at eighty, a cat lady
en_quotes.author: Juliette Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I'm looking more like my dogs every day - it must be the shaggy fringe and the ears
en_quotes.author: Christine McVie

en_quotes.quote: I have a real pet peeve for women who play damaged characters but don't look damaged
en_quotes.author: Patty Jenkins

en_quotes.quote: Nothing gives me quite so much joy as when people tell me they've had their pets spayed or neutered
en_quotes.author: Bob Barker

en_quotes.quote: I've never written a 'Revolver' or a 'Pet Sounds.'
en_quotes.author: Richard Ashcroft

en_quotes.quote: I have some road rage inside of me. Traffic, especially in L.A., is a pet peeve of mine
en_quotes.author: Katie Holmes

en_quotes.quote: Truth be told, ginormous portions have become a pet peeve of mine
en_quotes.author: Hal Sparks

en_quotes.quote: Growing up, I had an insane crush on Neil Tennant of the Pet Shop Boys
en_quotes.author: Erin O'Connor

en_quotes.quote: Environmentalists hate sprawl - except when it comes to the size of their expansive pet legislation on Capitol Hill
en_quotes.author: Michelle Malkin

en_quotes.quote: I was in New York and I walked into this pet store and came out with a dog
en_quotes.author: Beverley Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: My little dog, he did not get ill. It is so funny that people get ill on a boat and dogs do not
en_quotes.author: Anna Held

en_quotes.quote: I hate when people don't keep their word or they are late. Tardiness is a big pet peeve of mine
en_quotes.author: Tim Hudson

en_quotes.quote: We all have our pet things that we like to get religious about
en_quotes.author: Max Cannon

en_quotes.quote: One of my big pet peeves is single-use plastic bags. I think it's one of the stupidest ideas in the world
en_quotes.author: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: My biggest pet peeve is when people don't admit what they've done
en_quotes.author: Daniela Bobadilla

en_quotes.quote: All writers have their own pet commandments
en_quotes.author: Darin Strauss

en_quotes.quote: I love pet animals, but I don't have any
en_quotes.author: Asin

en_quotes.quote: I'm not about to go out and buy a snake for a pet. I mean, I may have faced a few fears but I'm not insane
en_quotes.author: Kristin Davis

en_quotes.quote: In summation, like your beloved pet rock, Twitter is useful only in your imagination
en_quotes.author: David Harsanyi

en_quotes.quote: My idea of a perfect pet is a really, really big dog! Huge!
en_quotes.author: Emily VanCamp

en_quotes.quote: One of my pet peeves in athleisure today is clothes that make a woman feel square and one-dimensional
en_quotes.author: Anna Kaiser

en_quotes.quote: I have a Lab, it's fun to hang out and hike with the dog, people come up to him, and pet him, it's fun
en_quotes.author: George Eads

en_quotes.quote: Only very brave mouse makes nest in cat's ear
en_quotes.author: Earl Derr Biggers

en_quotes.quote: I have a pet peeve about bands that don't play their hits. I think it's kind of selfish
en_quotes.author: Art Alexakis

en_quotes.quote: I'm a dog person, but I don't have a pet
en_quotes.author: Timothy Simons

en_quotes.quote: Pet stores just sell their animals
en_quotes.author: Booboo Stewart

en_quotes.quote: My pet peeve is when people criticize things when they're just trying to have a conversation
en_quotes.author: Jeff Baena

en_quotes.quote: My pet peeve is when people come over to my house, and there are coasters, but they don't use a coaster
en_quotes.author: Chord Overstreet

en_quotes.quote: I used to have a pet crawfish, so my friend made a mold of its claws and bronzed a key chain for me out of it
en_quotes.author: Betsy Brandt

en_quotes.quote: Ill-fitted T-shirts stretched over a gut are my pet hate. And if the colour's faded - ugh
en_quotes.author: Joanne Froggatt

en_quotes.quote: When I was pregnant with my first child, I was 35 years old, and I was working in a pet shop
en_quotes.author: Ann Dowd

en_quotes.quote: As a child, the most important people in my life were my pet rabbit and Mary, mother of Jesus
en_quotes.author: Sean Scully

en_quotes.quote: I have never been a pet lover or really craved the idea of having dogs
en_quotes.author: Kratika Sengar

en_quotes.quote: If the Beastie Boys and the Beach Boys and Pet Shop Boys can stay boys, so can we
en_quotes.author: Howie Dorough

en_quotes.quote: Legislators are interested in their pet projects, getting re-elected, and popularity contests
en_quotes.author: Bud Grant

en_quotes.quote: I was very short. Everybody else was two years older in my class, and I had curly hair and was teacher's pet
en_quotes.author: Howard Stringer

en_quotes.quote: Gypsy was the name my brother gave a pet turtle he had. I always thought it was so peculiar
en_quotes.author: Joel Hodgson

en_quotes.quote: I was in three academic clubs, a huge book worm and the teacher's pet. I was kind of an easy target for bullies
en_quotes.author: Nicole Gale Anderson

en_quotes.quote: Our cat is kind dove shellfish, and thinks the world is hers, She finds a comfy spot and then we pet turtle sheep purrs
en_quotes.author: Brian P. Cleary

en_quotes.quote: Kittens can happen to anyone
en_quotes.author: Paul Gallico

en_quotes.quote: Many cats are the death of the mouse
en_quotes.author: Kaspar Hauser

en_quotes.quote: I heard that Jesus had a pet dinosaur. Evolution must be a myth then
en_quotes.author: John Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I'm no one's pet, and I intend to be an independent voice in the U.S. Senate
en_quotes.author: Chris Coons

en_quotes.quote: Do not make the mistake of treating your dogs like humans or they will treat you like dogs
en_quotes.author: Martha Scott
